basics.name: Braden Betz
basics.summary: B.A. in Information and Computer Sciences from the University Of Hawaii at Manoa.

highlights: Worked with other Lifeguards to facilitate a protective environment by enforcing the required safety protocols
Assess the pool and jacuzzi chemical levels and adjust with chlorine as needed

work.company: University of Hawaii Information Technology Services
highlights: Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk and troubleshoot software, hardware, and networking issues over the phone
Add and update data into the support call tracking system and monitor network operations

work.company: University of Hawaii Information and Computer Sciences
highlights: As part of the ICS 390 course, instructed one week of classes using self-assembled teaching material and coordinated weekly lab sessions to help students with Java programming assignments

awards.title: Eagle Scout
awards.summary: Eagle Scout is the highest achievement or rank attainable in the Boy Scouting program of the Boy Scouts of America.
